category.description: The topic category of the question

options.description: An array of exactly 4 possible answer options

correct.description: The index of the correct option (0-3)

rationale.description: Explanation of why the correct answer is right

examples.question: Which of the following is used as the primary basis for modern classification of living organisms?
examples.rationale: Modern classification systems are based primarily on evolutionary relationships rather than physical appearance, using genetics and molecular biology to determine relationships between organisms.

examples.question: Which organism belongs to the kingdom Plantae?
examples.rationale: Rose plants belong to the kingdom Plantae as they are multicellular organisms that can prepare their own food through photosynthesis and have cell walls made of cellulose.
